channel.title: I need help with me 562 server please
channel.description:
if i type a command into the game it says this
"Use the reverse apostrophe (`) to open the console to enter that command. It is usually located under the ESC key."
i press the "`" key and type a command in there but the console thing doesnt work.. how can i fix that? or how can i disable that console and put it back to normal :: commands
im not sure if this is client related or server related

item.title: I need help with me 562 server please

item.description:
@pur3spoon wrote:

yea i have tried that it does nothing
it doesnt respond to anything typed into it
im using a base 562 server
